ipu_wugen.h File Reference
CSL ARCH Module » M4 » WUGEN

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring MPU_WUGEN for ARM Cortex-M4. More...

Macros

#define IPU_WUGEN_NUM_INTR_INTERNAL   (16U)
 Number of Internal Interrupts IPU can service.
 
#define IPU_WUGEN_FIRST_EXTERNAL_INT_NUM   (23U)
 First interrupt number which is external.
 

Functions

void IPU_WUGEN_Init (void)
 This API is used to initialize MPU_WUGEN. All wakeup events will be disabled after initialization. More...
 
void IPU_WUGEN_DisableAll (void)
 Disables all wakeup events for CPU. More...
 
void IPU_WUGEN_Interrupt_Lookup (void)
 Configure wakeup events by looking up the CPU0 interrupt settings. More...
 
void IPU_WUGEN_Enable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API enables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt. More...
 
void IPU_WUGEN_Disable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API disables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring MPU_WUGEN for ARM Cortex-M4.
